name: Linen Keeper
description:
Controls

Arrow keys - MOVE

X - Search for objects

SPACE-BAR - talk to NPC

ENTER - READ THROUGH DIALOGUE 

GENRE: Top-Down Courier/Detective Sim

STORY - You are a private investigator nicknamed the  Linen Keeper. Your clients come to you to keep their unwanted linen secret. Unbeknownst to them you are using these secrets to uncover a criminal syndicate.

OBJECTIVE - LOCATE ITEM REQUESTED AND RECEIVE CLUES

COLLECT ALL CLUES TO ADVANCE TO NEXT LEVEL 

Avoid the TRACKERS!

inspired by old detective shows.
